articles.author: Jason Scott, Catherine Bosley
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for May 21 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian shares took a breather on Tuesday after seven days of gains, and a gauge of commodities reached a 15-month high. Traders’ focus turns to earnings from chipmaker Nvidia Corp. later in the week.
articles.content:
Asian shares took a breather on Tuesday after seven days of gains, and a gauge of commodities reached a 15-month high. Traders focus turns to earnings from chipmaker Nvidia Corp. later in the week.
